content: Hi @T-compiler/meeting . I should have asked this in the meeting yesterday: Should we cancel the Thursday 27 compiler triage meeting, due to the USA Thanksgiving holiday? If the meeting is still held, I suspect I will not be able to run it, nor will I be able to attend.
I can attend - but I think canceling makes sense. It's only the first week after release so nothing super urgent
Since we just released yesterday, it seems unlikely there would be any time-critical beta-backports so I think canceling makes sense.
@pnkfelix to follow up on this I'm going to go cancel the calendar event
